content.overview: 1 Club Opening: longer clubs or 44 in c and d; denies 5M unless strong hands with 6+c and 5M

data.description: Walsh; 5+, 7+d any/ 4+d, no 4M; OR 5d4M, 4-5/15+ or 6d4M, 4-8/15+; Opener Rebids

1c2h.title: Opener rebids on 1♣2♥: Responses to Reverse Flannery (5♠4♥/55/65, invitational)

bids.text: Support (5431 with 3 in p's m) good 8-10
Good 5422, 11 hcp, values in short suits, 3n is doable
Slam try (c for h, d for s)

1c2n.title: Opener rebids on 1♣2NT: 10/11 HCP, no 4M generally denies 4♦ for 1♦2NT, non-forcing

bids.text: xx AQx qjxx KQxx; ftg gf 1 suiter in m, sets m

1c2c.title: Opener rebids on 1♣2♣: Inverted minor, 10+ HCP response

bids.text: Nat, promises 4+m; over this responder's 3m = nf; rest (inc 2n) = gf
Ftg; now opener's frag over this = 15-17

1c2d.title: Opener rebids on 1♣2♦: Mixed with singleton response

bids.text: D sing (shows 6+ clubs, since 4M is denied)

relayed bid, min; over this responder's 3c/3d = weak rest max reverse

bids.text: 4s, 5+d, wk hand (opener can choose between 1n and 2d)
Wk hand (4-6) with 3M ( can be 4 if 5d also)
Puppet to 2d to play or invite with 10-11 hcp
Bal inv; no suit fit possible
GF without 4M; subsequent bid showing 4OM is 15+ with 5d, 4OM
puppet to 3c for signoff or 64 hands (mild slam try)

art, ftg; subsequent bid of 3n by resp = mild slam try
puppet to 3c for signoff or 64 hands (mild slam try)

responder-rebids-1c1M2n-nv.title: Responder rebids on 1♣1M2NT when non vulnerable: 18/19 balanced

bids.text: xfer to d; xfer followed by 3M = 5M, 4+d
M = h: 5 h; over 3h, 3s = 5h4s, 4c = nat; 4d/4M = st with/without d cue M = s: 5s4h, opener bids 3h/3s only with fit
M = h: 4h4s; 3s bid only with fit; M = s: 5 s, over 3s, 4c = nat; rest cue

bids.text: art, inv; 2M/2OM= min with/out 3M; 3M/2n = gf with/without 3M; 3c = gf
5M, unbal (playing strength bid, 55 etc. need controls from op) or weak 6
6+ inv, not interested in 3n (with 6M, inv, and 3n possible, go via 2d)
55, if x < M; rest = spl for m, slammish

walsh.title: Walsh
walsh.definition: Holding 5+d and 4M; bid 1d ( instead of 1M) when
details: Weak hands (5-7) with 5/6 d and 4M; don't see game opp 18/19; so looking at signoff in d
Strong hands, 15+ hcp; On such hands, subsequently 2d gf shows 45 and 2n st shows 46

artificial-reverse.title: Artificial reverse
artificial-reverse.definition: (applicable only when non vul) 1x1y2z (y ≠nt; z = cheapest 2 bid) = single suit x/ 45; f1; over this, general algorithm is as below

algorithm.ask_bid: 2fs or 2n whichever is cheaper; (non sign off hands)
responses_to_asking: 2y if available = 3 card y, 45 in y and x
3y 3 card y, 45 in y and x ( if 2y is available then 3y = 6331)
3x single suit x, min, nf ( if 2n is asking 3x = single x min or 45min)
3n single suit x, min, good suit, COG
other_responses: 2n if not asking bid = nat, nf
3y long y, nf if 2y not available, if 2y available then 3y = 0/1 loser suit

natural-reverse.title: Natural reverse
natural-reverse.definition: 1x1y2z: z is not the cheapest 2 bid, (not art reverse); f1, gf if jump shift

general_responses: 2n or 2fs start of a possible weak sequence
3fs Can't raise p's suits, but good hand, slammish

red-text.description: Links to detailed sequences and rebids
